ZS is a professional services firm that works side by side with companies to help develop and deliver products that drive customer value and company results. From R&D to portfolio strategy customer insights marketing and sales strategy operations and technology we leverage our deep industry expertise and leading-edge analytics to create solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. ZSers are passionately committed to helping companies and their customers thrive in industries ranging from healthcare and life sciences to high-tech financial services travel and transportation and beyond.ZS's Business Operations group helps improve and run our clients’ entire system of business processes and operations thoughtfully designing solutions focused on operationalizing analytics implementing cutting-edge automaton technologies and transforming client business processes. Our teams support both project-based and outsourcing solutions for our clients that go beyond streamlining operations and reducing costs to bring domain focused insights practical innovations and superior customer experience.BUSINESS OPERATIONS ASSOCIATE/REVENUE MANAGEMENT ANALYSTRevenue Analyst takes ownership of maximizing hotel room revenue through daily management of room inventory and product pricing for assigned portfolio of hotels. The position is responsible for developing and recommending strategies related to room rate and inventory to optimize the best mix of business through multiple distribution channels for assigned portfolio of hotels in various markets. The daily practice of maximizing hotel rooms revenue through the development and implementation of effective transient inventory and pricing strategies based on future demand forecasts utilizing standardized tools and operational procedures. The Revenue Analyst must be strategic and decisive combining knowledge in ecommerce sales marketing and distribution to make the optimal revenue decisions in all channels.ResponsibilitiesServe as the primary point of contact for hotels in revenue management program. Provides consultative services and assistance to hotels and Area Directors as necessary to implement revenue management and distribution strategies. Manage the guest room inventory through the systems end date for assigned hotels. Manages rates and inventories in all distribution channels to ensure parity. Create recommend and evaluate strategic pricing decision by market segment and channel to maximize room revenues for assigned hotels. Lead the Revenue Management Meeting with the hotel team to review performance selling strategies and market trends for assigned hotels. Completes the Revenue Management Recap to communicate to the hotel the performance results and strategies of assigned hotels. Prepares and analyzes supporting documentation for revenue meeting for assigned hotels. Ensures all Revenue Management data files are organized and maintained. Act as a liaison between the hotel team and the client team as it pertains to Revenue Management. Utilize and share in depth knowledge of brand with assigned hotel teams. Ensure hotels are aware of new marketing and promotional opportunities as they are made available. Complete special projects and other responsibilities as assigned based on the needs of the team. Participate in development and roll out of team wide Revenue Management activities. At ZS project teams are typically small with people drawn from all levels of the organization and often from different offices. Your learning is accelerated through frequent interactions with experts. As a member of a ZS team you will grow over a period of time to help facilitate and manage client relationships.QualificationsWe welcome graduates from any Hotel Management or relevant field of work or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience with at least 1 year of experience. The common denominator in an individual’s success is a strong academic record and evidence of superior analytic skills.Innate quality orientation with an eye for detailExcellent task management and organizational skillsProblem solving skills and an ability to think through solutions in a structured environmentExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work in a team environment. Global exposure or experience of having worked in global cross office teams is preferredSelf-motivated with a willingness to take initiatives with a strong work ethicAble to apply high level critical thinking skills to understand and solve complex problemsStrong business acumenPrior team leading experience will be an added advantageMust apply in EnglishZS is a global consulting firm; fluency in English is required additional fluency in at least one European or Asian language is desirable.Candidates must possess work authorization for their intended country of employment. An on-line application including a cover letter expressing interest and a full set of transcripts (official or unofficial) is required to be considered. Resumes should be submitted in English. ZS offers a competitive compensation package with salary and bonus incentives complete medical/dental/life insurance programs and retirement savings benefits. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.NO AGENCY CALLS PLEASE. Regional Sales Manager Works Remotely (Colorado Or Austin Areas Preferred)Presence Rocky Mountain & Southwest Grocery RegionNatural products is what we do. It’s who we are. Presence Marketing is an independently owned natural food broker that was born from a desire to work in a dynamic and environmentally conscious industry working in communicative partnerships with other like-minded companies. We are passionate high energy have strong standards and vision and are committed to making natural and organic food the standard again. We love to learn are on-trend and care about our teams and their well-being. A Little About This RoleThe Regional Sales Manager’s function is to manage the day to day operations of the regional sales team while also maintaining a focus on the strategic goals of our manufacturer partners and our company. This position facilitates communication between our National Brand Management team their regional sales team and our manufacturers. They must be willing to roll up their sleeves be strong willed detailed driven highly motivated and dedicated to growing natural focused food brands and developing their team.A Day In The LifeLeadership – as the Regional Sales Manager you lead by example manage develop and coach the Presence Rocky Mountain and Southwest Sales team. You are the leader of the team and run the day-to-day operations responsible for developing and growing the sales team to maximize their potential capabilities to produce strong sales results create efficiencies review territories/store lists and perform market tours with the team.Strategic Sales Execution – you must be a high-performing individual with the ability to influence change and provide the team the tools they need. Capable in both the strategic aspects as well as the hands-on execution; consolidating and disseminating all manufacturer information including but not limited to promotions new items hip pocket deals case stacks holiday items truckloads overstocks displays demo audits market tours and spiff programs.Market Awareness -  continually maintain awareness and expertise of industry trends competitors competitive product lines current retail environment and available promotional and marketing programs.Analytics – knowing your business and opportunities is an essential piece of driving sales and leading the teams strategically. Understanding analyzing and presenting data such as SPINS Nielsen Power BI store level void reports and distributor data is important to manage the team and monitor/grow sales.Communication is key – you are expected to have value-added solution-oriented positive and timely communication (both internally and externally). This dynamic position requires working in partnership with all departments executive leadership as well as our vendor partners at all levels.This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Projects and responsibilities may change at any time with or without notice due to our business industry and/or market changes. Additional travel may be required for industry tradeshows and/or company meetings and events.What We Are Looking ForPrior experience and demonstrated success for managing and leading strong teams preferably a sales teamExcellent skills in the following areas: presentation negotiation analysis customer service selling communication organizationClean driving record reliable transportation valid driver’s license and current insurance is requiredDependable diplomatic person able to problem-solve successfully with a wide variety of people and issuesKnowledge and interest of the natural products/brands and retail landscape is a plusProficient computer (MS Office applications) and data-mining skills- including but not limited to Microsoft Excel One Note Outlook Teams SharePoint PowerPoint & Forms.Flexibility to successfully multi-task in a fast-paced environment with a positive attitudeAbility to read understand and evaluate SPINS and Nielsen DataAbility to manage time and deadlinesAbility to travel (approximately20-40%)CPGjobs. About Aggreko PlcAround the world people businesses and countries are striving for a better future. A future that needs power and the right conditions to succeed.That’s why at Aggreko we work ‘round the clock making sure our customers get the electricity heating and cooling they need whenever they need it – all powered by our trademark passion unrivalled international experience and local knowledge. From urban development to unique commercial projects and even humanitarian emergencies we bring our expertise and equipment to any location from the world’s busiest cities to some of the most remote places on earth.Every project is different so we listen first and design a system supported by our service anywhere to any scale. Transforming the lives and livelihoods of individuals organisations and communities across the globe.Purpose Of The JobTo develop and continuously improve the Commercial & Finance function within LAM through the management and coordination of all pricing models for tenders issued in the market and measurement against project execution. A key aspect of this role is to work closely with the Head of Commercial and the regional Commercial Managers BDMs PDR Engineering Operations Tax and other key functions supporting cost inputs improve the response time for proposals accuracy of cost models competitiveness and tracking / management of actual project costs vs. budget.Job Accountabilities/Key ResponsibilitiesLead all Project Cost modelling and coordinate kick-off meetings with key stakeholders and drive P&L development engineering support and prepare documents for final review with Sales and Management Liase with BDMs on a regular basis providing support on planning and development of Cost Models Support the tracking of project costs “as bid” vs. actuals through engagement with Project Management team and Finance Evaluate new enquiries for accuracy prior to P&L development and registration of enquiry numbers Develop and maintain a database of project costs to support functional review of project cost estimates Work with regional stakeholders on the continuous improvement of the Cost Model Regularley update project costs from Central and Manufacturing for new products and other variable cost components that are externally sourced Maintain country level P&L Cost Models and review quarterly with key stakeholders in ordert to accurately reflect the local taxes and other local costs Develop / maintain a central depository for all Cost Models issued across LAM power projects Review P&Ls with Head of Commercial / Project Controls to verify accuracy of costs and scope of supply Lead the development / continuous improvement of Firm and Budgetary Cost Models Continually review and present KPIs related to pricing presented enquiries raised and project returns Support Project Controls with development of localized cost models and P&Ls Liase with BDMs Engineering OPS and Product Sales Technical Support to in Cost Model and P&L development Review and update on a quarterly basis the Budgetary Proposal Pricing matrix and distribute to Head of Commercial Support Aggreko Value Proposition framework related to Sales Process improvements Develop a very strong understanding of the technical and economic features of products and product upgrades relevant to the LAM business. Support Commercial and Sales with change order pricing and disputes to reduce risks of unrecovered costs Aggreko places a strong emphasis on Quality Health Safety and Environmental protection. It is a requirement and moral obligation of each employee to be actively committed and accountable for compliance to the Aggreko Health Safety & Environmental policies procedures and local legislation and ensure completion and validity of all minimum QHSE training and objectives required by the company.Person Specification/Job RequirementsEngineering or Finance degree qualification preferred Fluent Spanish and English general understanding of Portuguese desirable Minimum 5-10 years’ experience in Latin America and/or Power Generation industry Experience in Cost Modelling and P&L development Strong financial acumen and understanding of Project Finance and Accounting Technical ability - Good understanding of technical features of Aggreko products for power projects. Quantitative skills - Highly numerate able to calculate main parameters (e.g. fuel efficiency) of Aggreko products against competitive offerings. Technology-savvy - Generally well informed both in terms of the next generation of developments for Aggreko products as well as how other competitive products (e.g. turbines) might evolve. Market & competitive orientation – complements technical skill with commercial awareness and understands market/competitive dynamics. Messaging to salesforce – is an excellent communicator – verbal and written – as this is critical to defining and delivering messages to salesforce. Prior experience - previous experience in project sales and/or marketing roles supporting project sales is an advantage. Good listener who seeks broad input and remains well-informed.  Inquisitive always looking for improvement opportunities and challenging constructively. ZS is a professional services firm that works side by side with companies to help develop and deliver products that drive customer value and company results. From R&D to portfolio strategy customer insights marketing and sales strategy operations and technology we leverage our deep industry expertise and leading-edge analytics to create solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. ZSers are passionately committed to helping companies and their customers thrive in industries ranging from healthcare and life sciences to high-tech financial services travel and transportation and beyond.ZS's Business Operations group helps improve and run our clients’ entire system of business processes and operations thoughtfully designing solutions focused on operationalizing analytics implementing cutting-edge automaton technologies and transforming client business processes. Our teams support both project-based and outsourcing solutions for our clients that go beyond streamlining operations and reducing costs to bring domain focused insights practical innovations and superior customer experience.BUSINESS OPERATIONS ASSOCIATE/REVENUE MANAGEMENT ANALYSTRevenue Analyst takes ownership of maximizing hotel room revenue through daily management of room inventory and product pricing for assigned portfolio of hotels. The position is responsible for developing and recommending strategies related to room rate and inventory to optimize the best mix of business through multiple distribution channels for assigned portfolio of hotels in various markets. The daily practice of maximizing hotel rooms revenue through the development and implementation of effective transient inventory and pricing strategies based on future demand forecasts utilizing standardized tools and operational procedures. The Revenue Analyst must be strategic and decisive combining knowledge in ecommerce sales marketing and distribution to make the optimal revenue decisions in all channels.ResponsibilitiesServe as the primary point of contact for hotels in revenue management program. Provides consultative services and assistance to hotels and Area Directors as necessary to implement revenue management and distribution strategies. Manage the guest room inventory through the systems end date for assigned hotels. Manages rates and inventories in all distribution channels to ensure parity. Create recommend and evaluate strategic pricing decision by market segment and channel to maximize room revenues for assigned hotels. Lead the Revenue Management Meeting with the hotel team to review performance selling strategies and market trends for assigned hotels. Completes the Revenue Management Recap to communicate to the hotel the performance results and strategies of assigned hotels. Prepares and analyzes supporting documentation for revenue meeting for assigned hotels. Ensures all Revenue Management data files are organized and maintained. Act as a liaison between the hotel team and the client team as it pertains to Revenue Management. Utilize and share in depth knowledge of brand with assigned hotel teams. Ensure hotels are aware of new marketing and promotional opportunities as they are made available. Complete special projects and other responsibilities as assigned based on the needs of the team. Participate in development and roll out of team wide Revenue Management activities. At ZS project teams are typically small with people drawn from all levels of the organization and often from different offices. Your learning is accelerated through frequent interactions with experts. As a member of a ZS team you will grow over a period of time to help facilitate and manage client relationships.QualificationsWe welcome graduates from any Hotel Management or relevant field of work or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience with at least 1 year of experience. The common denominator in an individual’s success is a strong academic record and evidence of superior analytic skills.Innate quality orientation with an eye for detailExcellent task management and organizational skillsProblem solving skills and an ability to think through solutions in a structured environmentExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work in a team environment. Global exposure or experience of having worked in global cross office teams is preferredSelf-motivated with a willingness to take initiatives with a strong work ethicAble to apply high level critical thinking skills to understand and solve complex problemsStrong business acumenPrior team leading experience will be an added advantageMust apply in EnglishZS is a global consulting firm; fluency in English is required additional fluency in at least one European or Asian language is desirable.Candidates must possess work authorization for their intended country of employment. An on-line application including a cover letter expressing interest and a full set of transcripts (official or unofficial) is required to be considered. Resumes should be submitted in English. ZS offers a competitive compensation package with salary and bonus incentives complete medical/dental/life insurance programs and retirement savings benefits. Regional Sales Manager Works Remotely (Colorado Or Austin Areas Preferred)Presence Rocky Mountain & Southwest Grocery RegionNatural products is what we do. It’s who we are. Presence Marketing is an independently owned natural food broker that was born from a desire to work in a dynamic and environmentally conscious industry working in communicative partnerships with other like-minded companies. We are passionate high energy have strong standards and vision and are committed to making natural and organic food the standard again. We love to learn are on-trend and care about our teams and their well-being. A Little About This RoleThe Regional Sales Manager’s function is to manage the day to day operations of the regional sales team while also maintaining a focus on the strategic goals of our manufacturer partners and our company. This position facilitates communication between our National Brand Management team their regional sales team and our manufacturers. They must be willing to roll up their sleeves be strong willed detailed driven highly motivated and dedicated to growing natural focused food brands and developing their team.A Day In The LifeLeadership – as the Regional Sales Manager you lead by example manage develop and coach the Presence Rocky Mountain and Southwest Sales team. You are the leader of the team and run the day-to-day operations responsible for developing and growing the sales team to maximize their potential capabilities to produce strong sales results create efficiencies review territories/store lists and perform market tours with the team.Strategic Sales Execution – you must be a high-performing individual with the ability to influence change and provide the team the tools they need. Capable in both the strategic aspects as well as the hands-on execution; consolidating and disseminating all manufacturer information including but not limited to promotions new items hip pocket deals case stacks holiday items truckloads overstocks displays demo audits market tours and spiff programs.Market Awareness -  continually maintain awareness and expertise of industry trends competitors competitive product lines current retail environment and available promotional and marketing programs.Analytics – knowing your business and opportunities is an essential piece of driving sales and leading the teams strategically. Understanding analyzing and presenting data such as SPINS Nielsen Power BI store level void reports and distributor data is important to manage the team and monitor/grow sales.Communication is key – you are expected to have value-added solution-oriented positive and timely communication (both internally and externally). This dynamic position requires working in partnership with all departments executive leadership as well as our vendor partners at all levels.This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Projects and responsibilities may change at any time with or without notice due to our business industry and/or market changes. Additional travel may be required for industry tradeshows and/or company meetings and events.What We Are Looking ForPrior experience and demonstrated success for managing and leading strong teams preferably a sales teamExcellent skills in the following areas: presentation negotiation analysis customer service selling communication organizationClean driving record reliable transportation valid driver’s license and current insurance is requiredDependable diplomatic person able to problem-solve successfully with a wide variety of people and issuesKnowledge and interest of the natural products/brands and retail landscape is a plusProficient computer (MS Office applications) and data-mining skills- including but not limited to Microsoft Excel One Note Outlook Teams SharePoint PowerPoint & Forms.Flexibility to successfully multi-task in a fast-paced environment with a positive attitudeAbility to read understand and evaluate SPINS and Nielsen DataAbility to manage time and deadlinesAbility to travel (approximately20-40%)CPGjobs. Transforming the lives and livelihoods of individuals organisations and communities across the globe.Purpose Of The JobTo develop and continuously improve the Commercial & Finance function within LAM through the management and coordination of all pricing models for tenders issued in the market and measurement against project execution. the response time for proposals accuracy of cost models competitiveness and tracking / management of actual project costs vs. budget.Job Accountabilities/Key ResponsibilitiesLead all Project Cost modelling and coordinate kick-off meetings with key stakeholders and drive P&L development engineering support and prepare documents for final review with Sales and Management Liase with BDMs on a regular basis providing support on planning and development of Cost Models Support the tracking of project costs “as bid” vs. actuals through engagement with Project Management team and Finance Evaluate new enquiries for accuracy prior to P&L development and registration of enquiry numbers Develop and maintain a database of project costs to support functional review of project cost estimates Work with regional stakeholders on the continuous improvement of the Cost Model Regularley update project costs from Central and Manufacturing for new products and other variable cost components that are externally sourced Maintain country level P&L Cost Models and review quarterly with key stakeholders in ordert to accurately reflect the local taxes and other local costs Develop / maintain a central depository for all Cost Models issued across LAM power projects Review P&Ls with Head of Commercial / Project Controls to verify accuracy of costs and scope of supply Lead the development / continuous improvement of Firm and Budgetary Cost Models Continually review and present KPIs related to pricing presented enquiries raised and project returns Support Project Controls with development of localized cost models and P&Ls Liase with BDMs Engineering OPS and Product Sales Technical Support to in Cost Model and P&L development Review and update on a quarterly basis the Budgetary Proposal Pricing matrix and distribute to Head of Commercial Support Aggreko Value Proposition framework related to Sales Process improvements Develop a very strong understanding of the technical and economic features of products and product upgrades relevant to the LAM business. Support Commercial and Sales with change order pricing and disputes to reduce risks of unrecovered costs Aggreko places a strong emphasis on Quality Health Safety and Environmental protection. It is a requirement and moral obligation of each employee to be actively committed and accountable for compliance to the Aggreko Health Safety & Environmental policies procedures and local legislation and ensure completion and validity of all minimum QHSE training and objectives required by the company.Person Specification/Job RequirementsEngineering or Finance degree qualification preferred Fluent Spanish and English general understanding of Portuguese desirable Minimum 5-10 years’ experience in Latin America and/or Power Generation industry Experience in Cost Modelling and P&L development Strong financial acumen and understanding of Project Finance and Accounting Technical ability - Good understanding of technical features of Aggreko products for power projects. Quantitative skills - Highly numerate able to calculate main parameters (e.g. fuel efficiency) of Aggreko products against competitive offerings. Technology-savvy - Generally well informed both in terms of the next generation of developments for Aggreko products as well as how other competitive products (e.g. turbines) might evolve. Market & competitive orientation – complements technical skill with commercial awareness and understands market/competitive dynamics. Messaging to salesforce – is an excellent communicator – verbal and written – as this is critical to defining and delivering messages to salesforce. Prior experience - previous experience in project sales and/or marketing roles supporting project sales is an advantage. BairesDev es la empresa líder de desarrollo de software de América. Con más de 1000 empleados trabajando en proyectos alrededor del mundo, un crecimiento anual sostenido de más del 50%, y reconocida por Inc. en el Top 10 de empresas privadas de mayor crecimiento de Silicon Valley, BairesDev se ha posicionado como referente en la industria del software, impulsando la transformación digital de algunas de las empresas más importantes en el mundo, como Google, Rolls-Royce, Pinterest, EY, SiriusXM, Motorola & ViacomCBS.Reconocida por Clutch co como una Compañía Top de Servicios Tecnológicos B2B, BairesDev cuenta con oficinas en Estados Unidos, Canadá, Europa y América Latina y ofrece un entorno de trabajo excepcional donde sus empleados pueden destacarse como profesionales, desarrollándose en equipos multiculturales con horarios flexibles y múltiples oportunidades de crecimiento.  BairesDev tiene como misión ofrecer servicios personalizados de desarrollo de software reconocidos por su excelencia a nivel mundial. La empresa contrata únicamente al Top 1% del Talento del mercado con el objetivo de crear equipos sólidos que ofrezcan soluciones tecnológicas de principio a fin. Prepárate para trabajar en escenarios dinámicos con líderes en la industria y en proyectos altamente innovadores!Buscamos Desarrolladores Salesforce Marketing Cloud para sumarse al equipo de Desarrollo y participar en distintos proyectos conformados por equipos multiculturales distribuidos en todo el mundo. Buscamos personas proactivas, dinámicas y team players, con gran capacidad de organización, acostumbradas a manejar múltiples tareas y con marcada atención al detalle. Se trata de una excelente oportunidad para aquellos profesionales que busquen desarrollarse en una de las empresas con mayor crecimiento de la industria! Estos desarrolladores enfrentarán numerosos desafíos técnicos, por lo cual deberán utilizar tecnologías actuales, involucrarse en el mundo mobile, de aplicaciones web, dispositivos, etc.Principales responsabilidades:- Configurar y estructurar modelos de datos (extensiones de datos, extensiones de datos compartidos, modelo de contacto).- Crear activos de marketing dinámicos y personalizados utilizando varios lenguajes de secuencias de comandos.- Desarrollar la experiencia web de Marketing Cloud (formularios de datos, páginas de preferencias personalizadas).- Trabajar y resolver escenarios utilizando REST y SOAP API.- Trabajar con clientes y datos de la plataforma (SQL, vistas, Enviar registro).- Escribir SQL básico, incluidas las declaraciones de unión.- Configurar la importación de datos.- Explicar la gestión de suscripciones.¿Qué Buscamos?- Más de 5 años de experiencia integrando Salesforce Marketing Cloud con Sales Cloud.- Experiencia en configuración de datos, manipulación y segmentación avanzada, así como informes y análisis.- Contar con experiencia práctica como desarrollador de pila completa para Marketing Cloud creando mensajes personalizados, dinámicos, páginas de destino y lenguajes de script de Marketing Cloud.- Dominar Marketing Cloud Connector, extensiones de datos, integración con sistemas externos (API) y conocimiento de DMP e integración de datos es clave.- Certificado en Salesforce Marketing Cloud Developer. (Deseable pero no excluyente)¿Qué Ofrecemos?- Excelente plan de compensación, muy por encima de la media del mercado.- Posibilidad de trabajo remoto y con horarios flexibles.- Planes de capacitación.- Amplias posibilidades de crecimiento y desarrollo profesional gracias a nuestro sistema de mentorship.Si está interesado en formar parte de un equipo compuesto por los mejores profesionales y trabajar 100% orientado a objetivos en un entorno innovador, pero con la estructura y los recursos de un líder de mercado multinacional, ¡no dude en postularse!

NOMBRE: CRM y Marketing  Automation Specialist IOL
DESCRIPCION: Empresa de servicios financieros se encuentra en la búsqueda de un Especialista en CRM y Marketing Automation.Nos orientamos a candidatos con fuerte conocimiento analítico, experiencia con informes y toma de decisiones basada en datos.Te contamos sobre las responsabilidades del puesto:- Diseñar e implementar el programa de CRM & Marketing Automation, ejecutando acciones concretas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation (Activación, Cross Selling, Up Selling y Fidelización, entre otras), por medio de canales como email, SMS, push notifications, Whatsapp y Facebook Custom Audiences.- Trabajar en equipo junto a referentes de Social Media, Email Marketing, Performance, Diseño y Comunicación como así también con las áreas de BI, IT, Legales, CX, Producto y con múltiples proveedores externos.- Desarrollar planes para la generación de leads e implementar un calendario de acciones y flujos de automation para los usuarios/clientes ya registrados en función de acompañar los objetivos de apertura de cuentas y alentar el uso de nuestros productos financieros conforme al ciclo de vida del cliente (Adquisición, Conversión, Madurez y Declive).- Liderar proyectos de gestión de datos e integraciones con la plataforma de CRM, con el fin de acelerar la generación de contenidos dinámicos e incrementar los criterios de segmentación que permitan maximizar los resultados de las campañas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation.- Seguir los indicadores o KPIs a diario, con el objetivo de cumplir con la cuota de aperturas de cuenta, tasa de fondeo y operación de los productos. Mínimo de 2 años de experiencia administrando plataformas de CRM y/o Marketing Automation, ejecutando múltiples canales (Email, SMS, Facebook, etc.) y analizando los resultados post-campaña.Candidato IdealConocimientos excluyentes:- Experiencia con test A / B y otras herramientas analíticas para garantizar la comprensión del cliente y el resultado de la campaña.- Conocimiento avanzado en Excel y administración de gran volumen de datos.- Conocimientos en Google Analytics y herramientas de Email Marketing.- Conocimiento básico de HTML, Adobe Photoshop y Adobe Dreamweaver.- Dominio del idioma Inglés (intermedio a avanzado).Habilidades:- Perfil analítico y proactivo, con excelente atención a los detalles (escrito y numérico).- Criterio para el desarrollo de mensajes de comunicación y valoración de diseño.- Curiosidad y apertura para incorporar el uso de nuevos lenguajes y herramientas.Ofrecemos:Excelentes condiciones de contrataciónHorario de trabajo de Lunes a viernes de 9 a 18 horas.

En Xappia seguimos buscando talentos!Somos una empresa en constante crecimiento e innovación. Creemos en el trabajo en equipo y compromiso para para lograr los mejores resultados. Tenemos oportunidades para quienes buscan crecer día a día innovando con tecnología de punta.Cómo sería tu día a día? Súper dinámico, lleno de aprendizaje en la práctica y mucho de trabajo en equipo. Trabajamos para diversas industrias con lo cual se nos presentan desafíos todo el tiempo porque son lógicas de negocio muy diversas, desde implementar para seguros, salud, entes estatales, laboratorios y mucho más. ¿Qué buscamos?-Estudiantes de Marketing, Publicidad o carreras afines.-Contar con experiencia mínima de 1 año en departamentos de Marketing.-Conocimientos de Email marketing y segmentación de base de datos.-Experiencia con alguna plataforma de automatización (Marketing Cloud, Emblue, Eloqua, Hubspot) e implementación de campañas. -Nociones básicas de HTML y CSS. -Conocimiento de Google Analytics y Adwords.-Inglés avanzado.y mucha buena onda!+ Es un plus  si contas con experiencia con plataformas de automatización, metodologías ágiles y conocimientos de procesos de negocio. Entre tus tareas te podes encontrar con:-Implementación de proyectos, donde realizamos relevamiento con el cliente, documentación y entrega del documento de alcance, configuración la plataforma, brindamos capacitaciones a usuarios claves y consultoría de negocios para llevar procesos de Marketing y de Negocios actuales a la Plataforma de Salesforce.-Servicio de Soporte sobre la plataforma, en el cual se involucra dando Consultoría de Marketing y Negocios a clientes actuales de Salesforce con el fin de resolver bugs e issues en la plataforma, sumar valor agregado a la misma y capacitar al personal del cliente. ¿Qué ofrecemos?Relación de dependencia directa, prepaga Swiss Medical, capacitaciones, inglés in company, certificaciones pagas, helado Freddo los Lunes, medialunas los Martes, día saludable los miércoles, gym 100% bonificado. Y los más importante... oportunidades de crecimiento.Horario: Full Time- 9.00hs a 18.00hsRemuneración: A convenirSi te sentís identificado esperamos tu CV!

Gestión con ingesta y control en redes sociales.- Asistir la promoción de lanzamientos con gacetillas para editores de tiendas digitalesy medios tradicionales y digitales.- Asistir en el relevamiento y contacto de medios de comunicación (TV, Radio, Gráfica,digitales) de la industria a fines a nuestro catálogo, de Argentina, Chile y Uruguay.- Asistir al armado de mailing quincenal, comunicación de la empresa y otros medios.- Generar reportes y presentaciones mensuales internas y a clientes con estadísticasy métricas actualizadas. Uso CreatorStudio y otras herramientas de inversión publicitaria digital. Segmentación deaudiencias. Experiencia y nivel avanzado.- WordPress y redacción SEO. Nivel básico.- E-mail marketing. Nivel intermedio o avanzado.- Plataformas tecnológicas que optimicen el trabajo de calendarización de posteos,reportes en línea y mediciones para seguimiento del negocio. Nivel avanzado.- Expresión escrita, ortografía, redacción y gramática. Redacción (Copy) pertinente almedio. Nivel Avanzado.- PhotoShop e Illustrator para poder editar imágenes. Nivel Intermedio - Avanzado.- Excel y Power Point para el armado y envío de reportes. Nivel Intermedio.- Edición de audio. Nivel básico.

Empresa Fintech emisora de tarjeta de crédito y préstamos personales con sede en Argentina y Uruguay se encuentra en la búsqueda de un Jefe de Marketing. Sus responsabilidades serán: -Desarrollar implementar y dar seguimiento a las estrategias de Marketing/Publicidad y a la medición de los resultados. -Investigar y evaluar la viabilidad y rentabilidad de promociones vigentes acuerdos comerciales con las marcas.-Analizar tendencias y requerimientos del mercado a los fines de garantizar que las estrategias estén alineadas con las prácticas actuales.-Trabajar en conjunto con las distintas áreas a los fines de desarrollar estrategias capaces de atraer nuevos clientes.-Planificar y supervisar la puesta en marcha de las campañas y estrategias estableciendo los tiempos de gestión. -Determinar vías para medir el impacto de dichas estrategias tales como los indicadores claves de rendimiento (KPIS ROI).-Supervisar la planificación de contenidos en Redes Sociales y pauta publicitara en Facebook y Google Ads. -Remitir informes sobre las actividades de Marketing y su impacto.-Administrar el presupuesto asignado al departamento de Marketing. Requisitos EXCLUYENTES: - Recibida/o de la carrera de Marketing o afines. - Tener conocimiento y experiencia en campañas de Facebook Ads y Google Ads.- Contar al menos con 3 años de experiencia en puestos similares Liderando el área de marketing (preferentemente en el rubro financiero).-Contar con disponibilidad para viajar esporádicamente a Uruguay en un futuro. Competencias claves del puesto:  Iniciativa Creatividad Habilidad para Comunicar y Transmitir de manera oral y escrita Capacidad de Redacción Visión Estratégica y Excelentes Habilidades Interpersonales.  Condiciones de contratación: -Jornada full time: lunes a viernes de 09hs a 18hs.-Zona de trabajo: Inicialmente Online. Nuestras oficinas se encuentran en Puerto Madero.-Beneficios corporativos.-Desarrollo de carrera y excelente clima laboral.

NOMBRE: GERENTE DE MARKETING para FARMACIAS CENTRAL OESTE
DESCRIPCION:
Para Farmacias Central Oeste buscamos Gerente de Marketing  Los desafíos de la posición serán los siguientes:- Ser responsable por el diseño planificación implementación seguimiento y cumplimiento exitoso de la estrategia de marketing. - Potenciar el desarrollo y la construcción de la marca en los canales físicos y online.- Potenciar el trabajo en equipo entre las áreas involucradas. - Analizar y desarrollar oportunidades nuevos servicios y negocios. - Gestionar el presupuesto anual del área.- Liderar y gestionar al equipo de Marketing ¿Qué buscamos?Orientamos el perfil a personas con 5 años de experiencia como gerente de marketing en compañías de retail (excluyente). Será importante contar con experiencia en liderazgo de equipos (excluyente). Deberá disponer de estudios universitarios completos. Será relevante contar con visión estratégica de negocio liderazgo pragmatismo flexibilidad perseverancia proactividad y excelentes habilidades de comunicación y negociación. Se valorará fuertemente lugar de residencia en zona oeste. ¡Esperamos tu postulación!

NOMBRE: Soporte Marketing Comercial y MKT Digital
DESCRIPCION:
La búsqueda es solicitada por una empresa profesional de optimización de Logística que brinda Soluciones y Servicios para lograr mayor eficacia en las operaciones de todo tipo de industrias.  Desde hace más de 15 años ayudan a las empresas de toda Latinoamérica a mejorar su logística obteniendo altos niveles de desempeño y ahorro de costos.El principal reto es realizar una planificación eficiente tanto de logística de ventas como de distribución y aprovisionamiento utilizando las soluciones más innovadoras del mercado lo que nos ha convertido en partners de empresas de alto prestigio mundial. Cuentan con metodología de implementación certificada el seguimiento y soporte post venta son altamente valorados por nuestros actuales y potenciales clientes. Para una importante empresa de tecnología de aplicación Logística con base en la Ciudad de Buenos Aires buscamos a una persona experta en la gestión Comercial Marketing y Marketing Digital.Sus responsabilidades serán:Diseñar la estrategia de MKT y ComercialGeneración de LeadsMantenimiento de las relaciones con el clienteDiseñar e instrumentar las estrategias de Marketing DigitalInformar y Proponer acciones en función del avance de resultados de cada campañaLa modalidad de trabajo es #remota y freelance por lo que será una condición necesaria la inscripción como monotributista.Se pauta un horario de trabajo en #homeoffice de 3 horas diarias en días hábiles y horario a determinar para llevar adelante la gestión de marketing tradicional y generación de Leads y trabajo a demanda para MKT digital según las estrategias que se pauten con la organización.Solicitamos a los interesados adjuntar (excluyente)a) Nivel de Honorarios Profesionales Requeridosb) Antecedentes profesionalesc) Link a Behance o portfolio profesional de campañas digitales. Requisitos: Beneficios:

NOMBRE: Coordinador de Operaciones y Trade Marketing
DESCRIPCION:
Clarín es una compañía de medios con más de 70 años de experiencia líder en prensa gráfica y digital de Argentina. A través de la calidad periodística de sus colaboradores y sus más de 25 productos editoriales brinda servicios informativos que reflejan y analizan los principales intereses y preocupaciones de la sociedad. Asimismo gracias a la incorporación de las últimas tecnologías y al profundo conocimiento de su audiencia Clarín logra conectar una amplia variedad de contenidos de valor con las personas correctas en el momento indicado y en el formato adecuado. Clarín busca potenciar su Producto 365 y es por eso que buscamos sumar un “Coordinador de Operaciones y Trade MKT” Nuestro desafío es potenciar la transformación digital de todos nuestros productos por eso estamos sumando colaboradores que: • Construyan relaciones sustentables.• Gestionen con actitud emprendedora• Innoven con creatividad productiva• Lideren la transformación digital• Sientan pasión por los contenidos ¿Qué hace esta posición?  -Coordinar al equipo de operaciones velando por el cumplimiento de todos los SLA pautados con los distintos clientes internos. (alta baja y modificación de comercios en salesforce)-Liderar diferentes proyectos de implementación y mejora de la experiencia de uso de la credencial 365 (transacciones Posnet/Lapos QR Sistema Propio) -Liderar el área de Trade marketing buscando mejorar la experiencia de uso en los comercios la correcta exhibición del material POP.-Mantener y generar una comunicación fluida con los comercios. -Generar mejoras en el relacionamiento B2C aplicando diferentes herramientas que fidelicen a los dueños y empleados de los comercios 365 para que promuevan el uso de la credencial.-Mantener y mejorar los materiales POP existentes. ¿Que buscamos? • Experiencia en manejo de proyectos y en liderar exitosamente equipos de Trade MKT.• Conocimientos avanzados de excel deseablemente salesforce.• Graduado o próximo a graduarse Te ofrecemos: • Acuerdos con universidades de renombre en carreras de grado y posgrado.• Cursos y capacitaciones que potencian tu trabajo.• Descuentos corporativos en indumentaria hogar entretenimiento etc.• 19 días de Vacaciones.• Día de cumpleaños free.• Descuento para el acceso a Megatlón.• Clarín 365 Plus.• Frutas 1 veces por semana.• Suscripción al diario digital.• Servicio de combis de regreso hasta av. 9 de Julio a partir de las 18.30• Descuentos en seguro para autos.   

			El contenido de este aviso es de propiedad del anunciante. Los requisitos de la posición son definidos y administrados por el anunciante sin que Zonajobs sea responsable por ello.

Capital Humano se encuentra en la búsqueda de un CRM & Marketing Automation Specialist para incorporarse a entidad financiera ubicada en CABA. Nos orientamos a graduados o estudiantes avanzados de Marketing o carreras afines con experiencia de al menos 2 años administrando plataformas de CRM y/o Marketing Automation ejecutando múltiples canales (Email SMS Facebook etc.) y analizando los resultados post-campaña. Entre sus tareas se encuentran:-        Diseñar e implementar el programa de CRM & Marketing Automation ejecutando acciones concretas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation (Activación Cross Selling Up Selling y Fidelización entre otras) por medio de canales como email SMS push notifications Whatsapp y Facebook Custom Audiences.-        Trabajar en equipo junto a referentes de Social Media Email Marketing Performance Diseño y Comunicación como así también con las áreas de BI IT Legales CX Producto y con múltiples proveedores externos.-        Desarrollar planes para la generación de leads e implementar un calendario de acciones y flujos de automation para los usuarios/clientes ya registrados en función de acompañar los objetivos de apertura de cuentas y alentar el uso de nuestros productos financieros conforme al ciclo de vida del cliente (Adquisición Conversión Madurez y Declive).-        Liderar proyectos de gestión de datos e integraciones con la plataforma de CRM con el fin de acelerar la generación de contenidos dinámicos e incrementar los criterios de segmentación que permitan maximizar los resultados de las campañas de 1:1 marketing y marketing automation.-        Seguir los indicadores o KPIs a diario con el objetivo de cumplir con la cuota de aperturas de cuenta tasa de fondeo y operación de los productos. Es requisito contar con manejo de Excel Avanzado conocimientos en Google Analytics y herramientas de Email Marketing. Se valorará un nivel intermedio/avanzado de inglés y conocimientos de HTML Adobe Photoshop y Adobe Dreamweaver. Lugar de trabajo: CABA Horario: Lunes a viernes de 9 a 18hs.

			El contenido de este aviso es de propiedad del anunciante. Los requisitos de la posición son definidos y administrados por el anunciante sin que Zonajobs sea responsable por ello.

La posición tiene como objetivo posicionar y potenciar la empresa en el mundo digital desarrollando ejecutando y supervisando planes de acción digitales sinérgicos.La posición tiene como responsabilidades primarias las siguientesPlanificación y gestión de redes sociales.Ejecución de campañas digitales.Armado de brief para piezas de diseño entre otras.RequisitosEstamos buscando profesionales técnicos o Lic. en Marketing con una especialidad o post grado en Marketing Digital con experiencia de al menos dos años Marketing digital manejo de CRM y sistema de email Marketing.Valoramos personas con perfil proactivocreativo organizado metódico sistemático y resolutivo con una fuerte orientación al trabajo en equipo.Disponibilidad full time.Residencia en Jesús Maria o zonas aledañas.BeneficiosSe ofrece la posibilidad de incorporarse a una empresa en constante desarrollo solida y con trayectoria en el mercado excelente clima laboral con un proyecto de expansión e interesantes desafíos laborales.GRUPO AGROEMPRESA Una empresa familiar con más de 36 años de trayectoria conformada por un conjunto de unidades de negocio que trabajan coordinadas para asegurar al productor asistencia integral y excelencia en la atención. Su Casa Central está estratégicamente ubicada a poco más de 50 Km de la ciudad de Córdoba en la localidad de Sinsacate. En un predio de 5 hectáreas es el hogar de GRUPO AGROEMPRESA allí se concentran sus oficinas para los grandes negocios de importación y exportación y sus 6 Unidades de Negocios Agroempresa Insumos Agroempresa Semillas Agroempresa Máquinas Cabaña Los SocavonesTransporteBodega Terra Camiare Ha consolidado su posición en todo el interior del país siendo una de las referentes más importantes a nivel nacional e internacional ofreciéndole a todos sus clientes tecnología de punta experiencia respaldo rendimiento óptima cobertura geográfica y la mejor variedad de productos y servicios con garantía de valor. Cuenta con sucursales en las provincias de Córdoba (Sinsacate San José de la Dormida La Puerta Río Primero Río Segundo Alta Gracia Sacanta y Santiago Temple) Chaco (Resistencia y Las Brañas) Formosa (Las Lomitas) Santiago del Estero (Bandera) Tucuman Capital y Salta (Las Lajitas). Talento innovación pasión profesionalismo calidez tecnología sustentabilidad son algunas de las cualidades referentes de los valores que hacen única a Grupo Agroempresa. Además de un amplio grupo de personas comprometidas y apasionadas por el campo argentino.Mostrar másMostrar menos

ZS is a professional services firm that works side by side with companies to help develop and deliver products that drive customer value and company results. From R&D to portfolio strategy customer insights marketing and sales strategy operations and technology we leverage our deep industry expertise and leading-edge analytics to create solutions that work in the real world. Our most valuable asset is our people—a fact that’s reflected in our values-driven organization in which new perspectives are integral and new ideas are celebrated. ZSers are passionately committed to helping companies and their customers thrive in industries ranging from healthcare and life sciences to high-tech financial services travel and transportation and beyond.ZS's Business Operations group helps improve and run our clients’ entire system of business processes and operations thoughtfully designing solutions focused on operationalizing analytics implementing cutting-edge automaton technologies and transforming client business processes. Our teams support both project-based and outsourcing solutions for our clients that go beyond streamlining operations and reducing costs to bring domain focused insights practical innovations and superior customer experience.BUSINESS OPERATIONS ASSOCIATE/REVENUE MANAGEMENT ANALYSTRevenue Analyst takes ownership of maximizing hotel room revenue through daily management of room inventory and product pricing for assigned portfolio of hotels. The position is responsible for developing and recommending strategies related to room rate and inventory to optimize the best mix of business through multiple distribution channels for assigned portfolio of hotels in various markets. The daily practice of maximizing hotel rooms revenue through the development and implementation of effective transient inventory and pricing strategies based on future demand forecasts utilizing standardized tools and operational procedures. The Revenue Analyst must be strategic and decisive combining knowledge in ecommerce sales marketing and distribution to make the optimal revenue decisions in all channels.ResponsibilitiesServe as the primary point of contact for hotels in revenue management program. Provides consultative services and assistance to hotels and Area Directors as necessary to implement revenue management and distribution strategies. Manage the guest room inventory through the systems end date for assigned hotels. Manages rates and inventories in all distribution channels to ensure parity. Create recommend and evaluate strategic pricing decision by market segment and channel to maximize room revenues for assigned hotels. Lead the Revenue Management Meeting with the hotel team to review performance selling strategies and market trends for assigned hotels. Completes the Revenue Management Recap to communicate to the hotel the performance results and strategies of assigned hotels. Prepares and analyzes supporting documentation for revenue meeting for assigned hotels. Ensures all Revenue Management data files are organized and maintained. Act as a liaison between the hotel team and the client team as it pertains to Revenue Management. Utilize and share in depth knowledge of brand with assigned hotel teams. Ensure hotels are aware of new marketing and promotional opportunities as they are made available. Complete special projects and other responsibilities as assigned based on the needs of the team. Participate in development and roll out of team wide Revenue Management activities. At ZS project teams are typically small with people drawn from all levels of the organization and often from different offices. Your learning is accelerated through frequent interactions with experts. As a member of a ZS team you will grow over a period of time to help facilitate and manage client relationships.QualificationsWe welcome graduates from any Hotel Management or relevant field of work or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience with at least 1 year of experience. The common denominator in an individual’s success is a strong academic record and evidence of superior analytic skills.Innate quality orientation with an eye for detailExcellent task management and organizational skillsProblem solving skills and an ability to think through solutions in a structured environmentExcellent verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work in a team environment. Global exposure or experience of having worked in global cross office teams is preferredSelf-motivated with a willingness to take initiatives with a strong work ethicAble to apply high level critical thinking skills to understand and solve complex problemsStrong business acumenPrior team leading experience will be an added advantageMust apply in EnglishZS is a global consulting firm; fluency in English is required additional fluency in at least one European or Asian language is desirable.Candidates must possess work authorization for their intended country of employment. An on-line application including a cover letter expressing interest and a full set of transcripts (official or unofficial) is required to be considered. Resumes should be submitted in English. ZS offers a competitive compensation package with salary and bonus incentives complete medical/dental/life insurance programs and retirement savings benefits. We are an Equal Opportunity Employer.NO AGENCY CALLS PLEASE. Regional Sales Manager Works Remotely (Colorado Or Austin Areas Preferred)Presence Rocky Mountain & Southwest Grocery RegionNatural products is what we do. It’s who we are. Presence Marketing is an independently owned natural food broker that was born from a desire to work in a dynamic and environmentally conscious industry working in communicative partnerships with other like-minded companies. We are passionate high energy have strong standards and vision and are committed to making natural and organic food the standard again. We love to learn are on-trend and care about our teams and their well-being. A Little About This RoleThe Regional Sales Manager’s function is to manage the day to day operations of the regional sales team while also maintaining a focus on the strategic goals of our manufacturer partners and our company. This position facilitates communication between our National Brand Management team their regional sales team and our manufacturers. They must be willing to roll up their sleeves be strong willed detailed driven highly motivated and dedicated to growing natural focused food brands and developing their team.A Day In The LifeLeadership – as the Regional Sales Manager you lead by example manage develop and coach the Presence Rocky Mountain and Southwest Sales team. You are the leader of the team and run the day-to-day operations responsible for developing and growing the sales team to maximize their potential capabilities to produce strong sales results create efficiencies review territories/store lists and perform market tours with the team.Strategic Sales Execution – you must be a high-performing individual with the ability to influence change and provide the team the tools they need. Capable in both the strategic aspects as well as the hands-on execution; consolidating and disseminating all manufacturer information including but not limited to promotions new items hip pocket deals case stacks holiday items truckloads overstocks displays demo audits market tours and spiff programs.Market Awareness -  continually maintain awareness and expertise of industry trends competitors competitive product lines current retail environment and available promotional and marketing programs.Analytics – knowing your business and opportunities is an essential piece of driving sales and leading the teams strategically. Understanding analyzing and presenting data such as SPINS Nielsen Power BI store level void reports and distributor data is important to manage the team and monitor/grow sales.Communication is key – you are expected to have value-added solution-oriented positive and timely communication (both internally and externally). This dynamic position requires working in partnership with all departments executive leadership as well as our vendor partners at all levels.This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for this job. Projects and responsibilities may change at any time with or without notice due to our business industry and/or market changes. Additional travel may be required for industry tradeshows and/or company meetings and events.What We Are Looking ForPrior experience and demonstrated success for managing and leading strong teams preferably a sales teamExcellent skills in the following areas: presentation negotiation analysis customer service selling communication organizationClean driving record reliable transportation valid driver’s license and current insurance is requiredDependable diplomatic person able to problem-solve successfully with a wide variety of people and issuesKnowledge and interest of the natural products/brands and retail landscape is a plusProficient computer (MS Office applications) and data-mining skills- including but not limited to Microsoft Excel One Note Outlook Teams SharePoint PowerPoint & Forms.Flexibility to successfully multi-task in a fast-paced environment with a positive attitudeAbility to read understand and evaluate SPINS and Nielsen DataAbility to manage time and deadlinesAbility to travel (approximately20-40%)CPGjobs. About Aggreko PlcAround the world people businesses and countries are striving for a better future. A future that needs power and the right conditions to succeed.That’s why at Aggreko we work ‘round the clock making sure our customers get the electricity heating and cooling they need whenever they need it – all powered by our trademark passion unrivalled international experience and local knowledge. From urban development to unique commercial projects and even humanitarian emergencies we bring our expertise and equipment to any location from the world’s busiest cities to some of the most remote places on earth.Every project is different so we listen first and design a system supported by our service anywhere to any scale. Transforming the lives and livelihoods of individuals organisations and communities across the globe.Purpose Of The JobTo develop and continuously improve the Commercial & Finance function within LAM through the management and coordination of all pricing models for tenders issued in the market and measurement against project execution. A key aspect of this role is to work closely with the Head of Commercial and the regional Commercial Managers BDMs PDR Engineering Operations Tax and other key functions supporting cost inputs improve the response time for proposals accuracy of cost models competitiveness and tracking / management of actual project costs vs. budget.Job Accountabilities/Key ResponsibilitiesLead all Project Cost modelling and coordinate kick-off meetings with key stakeholders and drive P&L development engineering support and prepare documents for final review with Sales and Management Liase with BDMs on a regular basis providing support on planning and development of Cost Models Support the tracking of project costs “as bid” vs. actuals through engagement with Project Management team and Finance Evaluate new enquiries for accuracy prior to P&L development and registration of enquiry numbers Develop and maintain a database of project costs to support functional review of project cost estimates Work with regional stakeholders on the continuous improvement of the Cost Model Regularley update project costs from Central and Manufacturing for new products and other variable cost components that are externally sourced Maintain country level P&L Cost Models and review quarterly with key stakeholders in ordert to accurately reflect the local taxes and other local costs Develop / maintain a central depository for all Cost Models issued across LAM power projects Review P&Ls with Head of Commercial / Project Controls to verify accuracy of costs and scope of supply Lead the development / continuous improvement of Firm and Budgetary Cost Models Continually review and present KPIs related to pricing presented enquiries raised and project returns Support Project Controls with development of localized cost models and P&Ls Liase with BDMs Engineering OPS and Product Sales Technical Support to in Cost Model and P&L development Review and update on a quarterly basis the Budgetary Proposal Pricing matrix and distribute to Head of Commercial Support Aggreko Value Proposition framework related to Sales Process improvements Develop a very strong understanding of the technical and economic features of products and product upgrades relevant to the LAM business. Support Commercial and Sales with change order pricing and disputes to reduce risks of unrecovered costs Aggreko places a strong emphasis on Quality Health Safety and Environmental protection. It is a requirement and moral obligation of each employee to be actively committed and accountable for compliance to the Aggreko Health Safety & Environmental policies procedures and local legislation and ensure completion and validity of all minimum QHSE training and objectives required by the company.Person Specification/Job RequirementsEngineering or Finance degree qualification preferred Fluent Spanish and English general understanding of Portuguese desirable Minimum 5-10 years’ experience in Latin America and/or Power Generation industry Experience in Cost Modelling and P&L development Strong financial acumen and understanding of Project Finance and Accounting Technical ability - Good understanding of technical features of Aggreko products for power projects. Quantitative skills - Highly numerate able to calculate main parameters (e.g. fuel efficiency) of Aggreko products against competitive offerings. Technology-savvy - Generally well informed both in terms of the next generation of developments for Aggreko products as well as how other competitive products (e.g. turbines) might evolve. Market & competitive orientation – complements technical skill with commercial awareness and understands market/competitive dynamics. Messaging to salesforce – is an excellent communicator – verbal and written – as this is critical to defining and delivering messages to salesforce. Prior experience - previous experience in project sales and/or marketing roles supporting project sales is an advantage. Experience with Sales Force CRM platformDesired SkillsExcellent communicator Numerate data-driven  Strong coaching and development skills  Strong leadership skills ability to develop and motivate teams in an international environment.  Good listener who seeks broad input and remains well-informed.  Inquisitive always looking for improvement opportunities and challenging constructively.  Adheres to the highest personal professional ethical and safety standards.  Self-starter who operates autonomously but highly collaboratively.  Energetic resilient and personally committed to achieving success.Desired Behaviors Team player and personally enthusiastic  Action-focused – reliable committed to completing tasks.  Resilience – persistent positive and self reliant.  Accountability – drives outcomes by taking personal responsibility. Able to give clear and unambiguous direction to individuals and teams about what they need to do in order to meet the organizations objectives.  Customer Insight – the ability to understand the markets that customers operate in to use this to identify underlying needs and then to apply this in a way that gives Aggreko a competitive advantage.  Working together with others – relates to people engages and builds relationships  Ability to view situations and conduct themselves in an objective and impartial manner  Positive Change orientation and motivator  Must be culturally sensitive  Drive for results – a deep seated inner desire to compete against standards of excellence and achieve “step changes” in business results.  Building capability - developing individuals and groups in order to increase the capability of the whole organization.  Compelling Communication – recognizing that clear communication is the key to understanding.Key Role Interactions Commercial Team  Area Sales Teams – BDMs  Area Engineering Teams  Regional Finance and Central Finance teams  Regional Operations Teams  Regional & Central PM Teams  Regional & Central Product Technical Sales SupportMostrar másMostrar menos

Established in 1962 with one shop in Seattle Wash. today Glass Doctor offers quick and affordable glass services to business home and auto owners at more than 270 locations across the United States and Canada. Our team of qualified experts lives our code of values of Respect Integrity and Customer Focus while having fun in the process! We hire reliable friendly and customer service-focused glass professionals and office staff who are dedicated to creating a delightful customer experience.As Inside Sales and Customer Service Representative you are a key member of the team and represent Glass Doctor on sales support calls scheduling and office management. You are responsible for proactively generating sales as well as handling service requests and customer complaints. Exemplifying our code of values you show respect and courtesy to all customers and employees.This position is for you if you are self-motivated energetic and results oriented with a high level of work intensity and a bias for action. You are driven to provide the highest level of customer service and satisfaction and able to effectively manage a variety of situations on a day day-to-day basis.Specific Responsibilities Meet or exceed monthly sales goals  Receive incoming calls in professional and courteous manner  Perform marketing and sales functions to sell additional work and earn business  Generate automotive and flat glass quotes using Point Of Sale software  Schedule work orders  Complete work orders return customer calls and respond to customer complaints  General office management  Perform other duties as needed which may include cross-training in related positionsJob Requirements Prior experience in the auto and/or flat glass industry is a plus  Computer literate with working knowledge of work processing business software and spreadsheet applications  Proficiency to navigate tablet based technology  Excellent communication skills  Good organizational and time management skills  Professional appearance and personality  Benefits:  Benefits package varies by location We are actively interviewing for this position - Apply today and our hiring manager will follow-up! Around here we’re not just glass experts. We’re skilled craftsmen. Makers. Doers. Problem solvers. We’re helping our customers make their homes the best they can be and their cars as safe as possible. Come join a brand rich in tradition big on collaboration and learning. A place where your ideas and expertise are valued above all. After all without your vision our customers couldn’t achieve their own.Mostrar másMostrar menos

We also take great pride in our operational efficiency and the effectiveness of the self-service tools and documentation we provide our customers. To continue providing this level of service during our fast growth we are looking for a very talented contributor with passion for researching complex technologies maintaining high customer satisfaction to help our customers be successful with Mulesoft products.You will help both customers and community users to be successful in the usage of MuleSoft's products by performing the initial analysis of the user's requests and solving them via troubleshooting and research in our Knowledge sources.You will address customer inquiries of cases and community questions and continue to enhance our knowledge-base to help our customers find answers via self-service.This is the stepping stone in an ever challenging career as a Support Engineer.To be successful in this position you will need to become an expert on analyzing and troubleshooting Application and Management platforms. You'd also need to master communication with the customers.**30 days:**+ You will start your journey getting trained in our Management and development products the troubleshooting process and tools+ Actively participate in forums+ Initial investigation of simple cases with supervision+ Become a certified MuleSoft Developer**60 days:**+ Perform the initial investigation of inquiries with minimal supervision.+ Adding and enhancing Knowledge Base articles.**90 days:**+ You will be a fully productive member of ourteam capable of handling initial analysis of all product's cases without supervision while delivering outstanding service for MuleSoft customers.+ Review troubleshooting statistics including Customer Satisfaction surveys. Based on the feedback improve the process and tools to make customers successful and improve our services.**The ideal candidate will have:**+ Experience as an Application or Platform troubleshooter Engineer+ Strong troubleshooting and analytical skills+ Excellent Verbal and Writing English communication Skills+ Ability to quickly identify the nature of an issue and to identify what it's needed to solve it.+ Good understanding of Internet technologies and protocols such as HTTP and FTP+ Experience using REST APIs+ Understanding of JSON XML and other data object representation languages.+ Experience using and troubleshooting development tools such as Eclipse IDE mapping tools and testing frameworks+ You like to self-explore new technologies and find yourself learning faster than others+ You possess the ability to explain technical issues to a variety of audiences including enterprise clients and experienced software developers/architects**Below is a list of preferred technical requirements. Bear in mind that we always favor good personality talent energy and a history of being a top performer as a professional or student over any specific skill set.**+ Understanding of SOAP REST and/or Web Services technologies+ Understanding of JSON and XML and Data Models+ Understanding of Eclipse or other development tools and testing frameworks**Benefits & Perks!**+ Competitive compensation+ Employee Stock Purchase Program+ Catered lunch in the office 3 days a week+ OSDE 410 for the family group+ Wellness and Education Reimbursement+ Unlimited PTO+ Parental Leave+ Bimonthly salary inflation reviews+ Childcare subsidies+ And more!**Accommodations**If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via thisAccommodations Request Form.at http://cloud.mail.salesforce.com/accommodations-request-form**Posting Statement**At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Quest Food Management Services is looking for a Cook I / Entry-level Prep Cook to join our team! Work for a growing company with a personal touch. Leadership is visible approachable and shows that they care about their teams. Quest allows you to become an integral part of the local community in an environment where you are listened to supported and work-life balance and consistent scheduling is a priority. You are not just a number at Quest.We Are Committed To Creating The Most Enduring Relationships In The Industry By What We Do And How We Do It Which Is Achieved Through An Unwavering Commitment To Our ValuesWe provide the communities we serve with fresh high-quality food exceptional responsiveness and intensely personal service. Integrity: we do the right thing at all times  Responsiveness: we listen and respond quickly to provide the best solutions  Accountability: we do what we say we will do and accept responsibility for the results  Respect: we treat others better than we expect to be treated ourselves  Excellence: we deliver the best experience possiblePosition SummaryCook I / Entry-level Prep Cooks prepare and present menu items during service of the cafeteria to Quest standards. Follows preparation list for items needed for execution of menus and assist in the day to day operations of the kitchen. Duties may include bulk preparation catering prep product receiving and cleaning. Assists customers and maintains line in a consistent and professional manner.Essential Duties And Responsibilities Prepare food as assigned and per directions production sheets standardized recipes and time schedule.  Accurately assemble and present menu items.   Follow Quest local State and Federal guidelines for the proper handling of food products.   Assist in the overall sanitation of the line and product kitchen. Work with other members of the kitchen as a team.   Maintain open and effective communication with others.   Prepare all items to standardized recipes according to each specific event’s needs as outlined on the menu.   Communicate to supervisor product shortages ordering needs and maintenance issues to maintain the level of day to day business. Successful candidate(s) must have an outgoing friendly and customer focused attitude and must have the ability work with speed attention to detail consistency and organization. Punctuality reliability and the ability to work effectively on a team are a must.Other Requirements Include Associate’s Degree in Culinary Arts or equivalent work experience   Minimum of 1 year of experience as a prep cook   Food Handler certification   Ability to perform simple arithmetic as well as to understand measurements and conversions   Ability to follow recipes   Comfortable and pleasant demeanor in very busy environments   Ability to read write and speak English Quest Food Management Services is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. Quest Food Management Services takes a “we” approach not a vendor-customer approach.Quest Food Management Services was founded in 1985 in Lombard Illinois with the goal of providing fresh made from scratch food and intensely personal service. Today we have grown to over $50M in annual revenue through our partnerships with over 75 accounts in the Midwest. We serve business & industry higher education conference centers and the K-12 segment. We have a depth of experience in facility and equipment design and construction offer a wealth of expertise in nutrition marketing food safety and sanitation staff management and community building.In 2018 Quest was ranked #34 in Food Management Magazine's Top 50 food management companies in the United States up six spots from 2017 and rated as one of the fastest growing companies in our industry. This marks the third year in a row that Quest has been in the top six regarding growth rate.We know how to build a fresh dynamic and interesting food service program that appeals to your community. In fact we believe we do that better than anyone in the Midwest. We take an approach of building programs that mirror quick serve restaurant approaches popular with students today. We are big enough to offer security and systems and small enough to be nimble to the smallest request.Mostrar másMostrar menos
